title: Kure-nai - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Drama   Harem   Romance   School Life   Shounen   Supernatural
tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manga   Apartment Life   Childcare   Male Protagonist
author: Katayama Kentarou
description: Kurenai Shinkurou is a high school student who works as a dispute mediator. One day, he is given the job of protecting a young girl by the name of Kuhouin Murasaki. He must now live with the young girl and act as her bodyguard.>
